      • getUser

        public UserTO getUser(java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String password)
        This method returns the user account details if email and password are authenticated.
        Parameters:
        email - - User's email used while creating the account
        password - - User's account password
        Returns:
        UserTO with all the details about the user

      • getUsers

        public java.util.List<UserTO> getUsers()
        Display all the users ordered by email address using email secondary index.
        Returns:
        List of user TOs ordered by email IDs

      • addUser

        public UserTO addUser(java.lang.String userJSON)
               throws DAOException
        This method takes JSON string representing User table and writes it into the database
        Parameters:
        userJSON - - User can pass a JSON string representing User row. You can pass partial JSON string ie. not setting all the fields present in the user table.
        Returns:
        UserTO - Returns UsertTO with everything that was being passed plus system created values like userId, createdOn dates etc.
        Throws:
        DAOException - is thrown if user already exist with same userId

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
